lines.string: Oh Dear! How could I have forgotten Christmas!
What am I to do, what am I to do?
Santa? Is there anything I can do?
No, that's quite alright Thanks though. Here
have this for your kindness and generosity,
throughout the year!
Oh dear, you don't seem to have the total level of 300
required in order to claim this gift. Return to me once
you have gotten that requirement.
Why here you go young man!
Merry Christmas!
Greetings adventurer.
I am Phileas the lumbridge guide. I am here to give
directions to new players Do you require help?
Yes please.
No I can find things myself, thank you.
Yes please.
First I must warn you to take every precaution to
keep your csPRO password and pin secure.
The most important thing to remember is to never give
your password to or share your account with anyone.
I have much more information to impart what
would you like to know about?
Yes please.
No i can find things myself, thank you.
Where can I find a quest to go on?
What monsters should i fight?
Where can I make money?
I'd like to know more about security and safety.
I should be good for now, thanks.
Where can I find a quest to go on?
By going to a blue star on the map.
What monsters should I fight?
Well, it's going to be tough fighting monsters
without a weapon. I suggest you get a weapon first.
Yeah, that's for sure, but what should I fight
once I have gotten a weapon?
There are things to kill all over the place! At your level,
you might want to try wandering westwards to the wizards
tower or north-west to the barbarian village. Non-player
characters appear as yellow dots on your minimap, though
there are some that you wont be able to fight such as
myself. If you explore further afield you may be able to
find less crowded areas, but watch out for monsters that
are tougher than you. A monsters combat level is shown
next to the 'attack' option. If that level is coloured
green it means the monster is weaker than you, if it's
red it means you need to run away! Remember you will
do better if you have better armour and weapons it's
always worth carrying a bit of food to heal yourself.
If you are a level 3 try fighting some cows at first,
then when you are strong enough you can move to more
vicious monsters.
Where or how can I make money?
There are so many ways to make money here. I would
suggest either killing monsters or training a resource
gathering skill such as mining or woodcutting.
Also PK'ing and staking are very good ways to make money.
Please don't try to get money by begging off other players.
It will make you unpopular. Nobody likes a begger. But
sometimes you might get lucky! It is very irritating to
have players asking for your hard earned cash.
I'd like to know more about security and safety.
I can tell you about password security, avoiding
item scamming and in game moderation.
I'd like to know more about password security.
I'd like to know more about avoiding item scamming.
I'd like to know more about ingame moderation.
Never mind.
I'd like to know more about password security.
Well the first thing to remember with password security
- and I cant stress enough - is to never tell your
password, bank pin or recovery questions to anyone, not
even if they claim to be an csPRO staff member.
The csPRO staff will never ask you for your password.
Sharing your account is a bad idea even if you think that you
know and trust the person you are sharing with. Players have
lost items and even thier account this way. Sharing accounts
is also against the rules.
Is there anything else I should be aware of?
Yes also be careful where you enter your password.
Be aware that fake csPRO sites exist. Don't
fall for any of them. Only enter your password at
http://www.csPRO.org.
Also be aware of keyloggers, trojans and phishing
sites ahead they are very dangerous, I suggest you
get avast! antivirus if you do not have it.
I'd like to know more about avoiding item scamming.
There are very nice and helpful players on csPRO;
unfortunately as in real life there are some who aren't
so honest. Some people will try to trick you out of your
items. Try not to fall for this because we will not give
you the item you lost back. However people trying to scam
will get banned as it is against the rules. When you are
trading you have a second trade confirmation screen. Always
double-check that you are not getting the items you expect
on this page as some people may try to change what they
are trading at the last minute. Remember when you click
accept on the second trade screen the trade is not reversible.
Be aware of people offering to trim your armour. It is
impossible to do this they just want to scam you out of
your money. Also if you see someone asking you for help to
dupe report the player immedietly! Any dupes will resort to
an ip-ban! Also be free to ask any player moderator or
adminsitrator about the rules and regulations.
I'd like to know more about ingame moderation.
You will from time to time see moderator
characters in game. Remember a real staff member
will never ask for passwords, or any other personal
information. There is a player moderator and a
Game moderator. Player moderators have a silver
crown next to thier name while game moderators
have a golden crown next to thier name they are
also known as administrators. If you would like to
become a player moderator you will have to act
polietly and help others when needed. The csPRO
team will be watching for people with the best character
and game knowledge.
Never mind.
No, I can find things myself, thank you.
'ello and what are you after then?
I need another assignment.
Do you have anything for trade?
er.. nothing
Do you have any tips for me?
Thanks, I'll be on my way.
Do you have any tips for me?
Thanks, I'll be on my way.
Do you have anything for trade?
'ello and what are you after then?
I need another assignment.
Do you have anything for trade?
er.. nothing
Do you have any tips for me?
Thanks, I'll be on my way.
Do you have any tips for me?
Thanks, I'll be on my way.
Do you have anything for trade?
'ello and what are you after then?
I need another assignment.
Do you have anything for trade?
er.. nothing
Do you have any tips for me?
Thanks, I'll be on my way.
Do you have any tips for me?
Thanks, I'll be on my way.
Do you have anything for trade?
Greetings adventurer.
I am Sir Amik Varze, the leader of the White
Knights Castle. How may I help you?
Do you have quests for me?
I'm perfectly fine, thanks.
I'm perfectly fine, thanks.
Do you have any quests for me?
Hmm, I'm not really sure you're the correct
person to ask. But could you check up on the
Black Knights Fortress for me?
I have a feeling that there's something bad
about to happen.
I would like to go on this Quest.
Wooh, sounds scary..! I'm out of here!
Alright, I don't think I have anything better
to do anyway. I guess I'll just go check on the
Black Knight's Fortress for you.
Oh you will? Thank you very much adventure!
What was your name again?
You're welcome, I guess. My name is playerName.
Alright, I'll be sure to remember that.
Good luck on your journey.
Thanks, I'll be on my way.
Did you find anything of interest at the
Fortress?
Hello there, traveller.
What are you camped out here for?
Do you know any good adventures I can go on?
What are you camped here for?
We're looking for Zanaris....GAH I mean we're not
here for any particular reason at all.
Who's Zanaris?
What's Zanaris?
What makes you think its out here?
Who's Zanaris?
Ahahahaha! Zanaris isn't a person! It's a magical hidden
city filled with treasures and rich.. uh, nothing. It's
nothing.
If its hidden how are you planning to find it?
Theres no such thing.
If it's hidden how are you planning to find it?
Well, we don't want to tell anyone else about that,
because we don't want anyone else sharing in all that
glory and treasure.
Please tell me.
Looks like you don't know that either..
Well it looks to me like YOU don't know EITHER.
seeing as you're all just sat around here..
Of course we know! We just haven't found which tree
the stupid leprechaun's hiding in yet!
GAH! I didn't mean to tell you that! Look, just forget I
said anything okay?
So a leprechaun knows where Zanaris is, eh?
Ye.. uh, no. No, not at all. And even if he did - which
he doesn't - he DEFINITELY ISN'T hiding in some
tree around here. Nope, definitely not. Honestly.
Thanks for the help!
Help? What help? I didn't help! Please don't say I did.
I'll get in trouble!
Do you know any good adventures I can go on?
Adventures?? Pff, nope. Not at all.
What is Zanaris?
Zanaris? Did I say Zanaris? I definitely
must have meant Lumbridge. Pff Zanaris.. Nice one.
What makes you think it's out here?
Out here? What? I don't know what you're
talking about stranger.
Theres no such thing.
Oh no, you're completely right.
How could I be such a fool?
Please tell me.
Haha, do you really think I'm that stupid?
I made a promise not to tell anyone!
Please don't tell anyone that I've told
you about the leprechaun and Zanaris!
I'll get into alot of trouble.
Ay yer big elephant! Yer've caught me, to be sure!
What would an elephant like yer be wanting wid ol'
Shamus then?
I want to find Zanaris.
Zanaris is it now? Well, well, well... Yer'll be needing to
be going to that funny little shed out there in the
swamp, so you will.
...but... I thought... Zanaris was a city...?
Aye that it is!
How does it fit in a shed then?
I've been in that shed, I didn't see a city.
...How does it fit in a shed then?
I've been in that shed, I didn't see a city.
Ah yes stupid elephant! The city isn't IN the shed! The
doorway to the shed is being a portan to Zanaris, so it
is.
So I just walk into the shed and end up in Zanaris
then?
Oh, was I fergetting to say? Yer need to be carrying a
Dramenwood staff to be getting there! Otherwise Yer'll
just be ending up in the shed.
So where would I get a staff?
Dramenwood staffs are crafted from branches of the
Dramen tree, so they are. I hear there's a Dramen
tree over on the island of Entrana in a cave
Or some such. There would probably be a good place
for an elephant like yet to be starting looking I reckon.
The monks are running a ship from Port Sarim to
Entrane, I hear too. Now leave me alone yer elephant!
Do you seek passage to holy Entrana? If do you must
leave your weaponry and armour behind. This is
Saradomin's will.
No, not right now.
Yes, okay. I'm ready to go.
Yes, okay. I'm ready to go.
Very well. One moment please.
Be careful going in there! You are unarmed, and there
is much evilness lurking down there! The evilness seems
to block off our contact with our gods,
so our prayers seem to have less effect down there. Oh
also, you won't be able to come back this way. - This
ladder only goes one way!
The only exit from the caves below is a portal which
leads only to the deepest wilderness!.
I don't think I'm strong enough to enter then.
Well that is a risk I will have to take.
I don't think I'm strong enough to enter then.
Well that is a risk I will have to take.
Do you seek passage to holy Entrana? If do you must
leave your weaponry and armour behind. This is
Saradomin's will.
No, not right now.
Yes, okay. I'm ready to go.
Yes, okay. I'm ready to go.
Very well. One moment please.
You must defend the Void Knight while the portals are
unsommoned. The ritual takes twenty minutes though,
so you can help out by destroying them yourselves!
Now GO, GO, GO!
What's going on?
How do I repair things?
I want to leave.
I'd better get back to it then.
I want to leave.
Its is people like you causing the evil portals to
win the game. Well, I don't want to spend time arguing
with you, I'll send you on the boat immediately!
Thanks for your help anyway.
How do I repair things?
In order to repair the Barricades or a broken door, you'll
need a hammer, as well as any type of logs! Either you
click the repair option one the broken objects, or you use
your log with it.
The Void Knight was killed, another of our Order has
fallen and that Island is lost.
Congratulations! You managed to destroy all the portals!
We've awarded you one Void Knight Commendation
point. Please also accept these coins as a reward.
All the portals were destroyed, but according to
our records, you didn't seem to be a part of the game
at all. Therefore we decided not to give you any
rewards.
Why hello there! I'm Kamfreena. Like the look of my
pets? I think they're eyeing you up.
That was a really bad pun.
Sorry... I don't get to see the rest of the guild much,
stuck up here. The Cyclopes don't talk much you see.
Shouldn't that be cyclopses?
Nope! Cyclopes is the plural of cyclops. One cyclops,
many cyclopes.
Oh, right, thanks.
Where are they from?
How did they get here?
Why are they here?
Bye!
Bye!
See you back here soon I hope!
I'll release some cyclopes which might drop bronze
defenders for you to start off with, unless you show me
another. Have fun in there.
I have a Bronze defender, please let me in to kill some
more Cyclopes!
Bronze eh? The next cyclopes are ready, toddle in
when you're ready.
Ahh I see that you have one of the defenders already!
Well done.
I'll release some cyclopes which might drop the next
defender for you. Have fun in there.
Ahh I see that you have one of the rune defenders
already! Well done.
I'll release some cyclopes which might drop the same
rune defender for you as there isn't any higher! Have
fun in there.
In order to enter this room, you must have at least 100
Warrior Guild Tokens. You can earn those warious
places at the two floors below us..
Time is up! You have ran out of Warrior Guild Tokens.
Please leave the room of Cyclopes as soon as possible.
I said TIME UP! Please leave by yourself next time.
Greetings! I see you are a new arrival to this land. My
job is to welcome all new visitors. So welcome!
You have already learned the first thing needed to
succeed in this world: talking to other people!
You will find many inhabitants of this world have useful
things to say to you. By clicking on them with your
mouse you can talk to them.
I would also suggest reading through some of the
supporting information on the website. There you can
find the Knowledge Base, which contains all the
additional information you're ever likely to need. It also
contains maps and helpful tips to help you on your
journey.
You will notice a flashing icon of a spanner; please click
on this to continue the tutorial.
I'm glad you're making progress!
To continue the tutorial go through that door over
there and speak to your first instructor!
Hello there, newcomer. My name is Brynna. My job is
to teach you a few survival tips and tricks. First off
we're going to start with the most basic survival skill of
all: making a fire.
Well done! Next we need to get some food in our
bellies. Wel'll need something to cook. There are shrimp
in the pond there, so lets catch and cook some.
Ah! Welcome, newcomer. I am the Master Chef, Lev. It
is here I will teach you how to cook food truely fit for a
king.
I already know how to cook. Brynna taught me just
now.
Hahahahahaha! You call THAT cooking? Some chrimp
on an open log fire? Oh, no, no, no. I am going to
teach you the fine art of cooking bread.
And no fine meal is complete without good music, so
we'll cover that while you're in here too.
Ah. Welcome, adventurer. I'm here to tell you all about
quests. Let's start by opening the quest side panel.
Now you have the tournal open I'll tell you a bit about
it. At the moment all the quests are shown in red, which
means you have not started them yet.
When you start a quest it will change colour to yellow,
and to green when you've finished. This is so you can
easily see what's complete, whats started, and whats left
to begin.
The start of quests are easy to find. Look out for the,
star icons on the minimap, just like the one you should
see marking my house.
The quests themselves can vary greatly from collecting
beads to hunting down dragons. Generally quests are
started by talking to a non-player character like me,
and will involve a series of tasks.
There's not a lot more I can tell you about questing.
You have to experience the thrill of it yourself to fully
understand. You may find some adventure in the caves
under my house.
Hi there. You must be new around here. So what do I
call you? 'Newcomer' seems so impersoonal, and if we're
going to be working together, I'd rather call you by
name.
You can call me playerName.
Okay then, playerName. My name is Dezzick and I'm a
miner by trade. Lets prospect some of those rocks.
I prospected both types of rock! One set contains tin
and the other has copper ore inside.
Absolutely right, playerName. These two ore types can
be smelted together to make bronze.
So now that you know what ore is in the rocks over there,
why don't you have a go at mining some tin and
copper? Here, you'll need this to start with.
You should definetely try to smelt those ores in
the furnace right over there.
How do I make a weapon out of this?
Okay. I'll show you how to make a dagger out of it.
You'll be needing this...
Hi there. Well, I have to be honest with you. I'm
supposed to teach you about combat, but since our rats
ran away, I'll just unlock those side panel menu's for
you instead..
I believe that its impossible to learn how to fight by
killing a few rats anyway, so yeah. My advise simple:
Go our there and kick some ass to get a feeling of what
its like instead.. but remember, be carefull!
Hello. Who are you?
I'm the Financial Adviser. I'm here to tell people how to
make money.
Okay. How can I make money then?
How you can make money? Quite.
Well, there are three basic ways of making money here:
combat, quests and trading. I will talk to you through each
of them very quickly.
Let's start with combat as it is probably still fresh in
your mind. Many enemies, both human and monsters
will drop items when they die.
Now, the next way to earn money quickly is by quests.
Many people on RuneScape have things they need
doing, which they will reward you for.
By getting a high level in skills such as Cooking, Mining,
Smithing or Fishing, you can create or catch your own
items and sell them for pure profit.
Well, that about covers it. Come back if you'd like to go
over this again.
